text.div:
GeneticTestVS ValueSet

Value set containing codes representing genetic tests. Currently the best source of codes is the [Genetic Test Registry](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gtr). The user should be aware that the GTR cannot be a sole reliable source since the test data is voluntarily updated and there is no overarching data steward. This value set contains all codes from GTR.
